Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Authorizes local water and sewerage authorities to charge fees for surface runoff
Summary: Enacts the water bill fairness act; authorizes local water and sewerage authorities to charge fees for surface runoff.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing local water and sewerage authorities to charge fees for surface runoff
